translations: adv.快活地，活泼地；喳喳叫地

phrs.translation: 喳喳叫地, 啁啾叫地, 快活地

sentences.sentence: "As the economy grows, the demand for goods will increase and more truck drivers will be needed to keep supply chains moving," predicts the BLS website, chirpily.
sentences.translation: “随着经济的增长，货物需求将增加，需要更多的卡车司机来保持供应链运转”，BLS网站欢快地预测道。
